form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition To Classify The Status Of An Alien Relative For The Issuance Of An Immigrant Visa, 4m 401

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 Form Approved UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 43-RO 401 Immigration and Naturalization Service Petition To Classify The Status Of An Alien Relative For The Issuance Of An Immigrant Visa FEE STAMP 3-5-79 U.S. APPROVED INS FEE PAID 000039 PHI The petition was filed on Date The petition is approved for status under section: MAY 1979 DD 3-5-79 Sfh 203(a)(1) 203(a)(2) Different 201(b) SPOUSE - CHILD (date) (initials) 203(a)(4) 201(b) PARENT 203(a)(5) PHILA., PA. PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE A21 681 533 1. Name of beneficiary (Family in CAPS) (First/Given) (Middle) 2. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children: NAIR SANKARANARYANAN N. Nagendran Thampi 2-9-31 3. Date of beneficiary's birth (Month, day, year) India January 6, 1902 4. My name is: (Family in CAPS) (First/Given) (Middle) Syamala Alla Thankacki THAMPI NAGENDRAN 11-33 India 5. My phone number is 6. Other names used: (Include maiden name if married) (215) 666-5742 None FOIA (b)(6) 7. Family relationship - the beneficiary is my: Father 8. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) in: (Town or City) (State or Province) (Country) February 9, 1931 Trivandrum Kerala India 9. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) NA PRAN Thamps CONT NO US.bist CO. EDPP through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization 12/19/77 10646076 through marriage 11. My current address is: (c/o if appropriate) (Apt. No.) (Number & Street) (Town or City) (State & Zip Code) 11 Woodsedge Road, Audubon, Pennsylvania, 19403 12. No.) (Number and Street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 11 Woodsedge Road, Audubon, Pennsylvania 19403 2 78 present 14. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: n/a FOIA (b)(6) A. Date and place of your present marriage B. Names of all my prior spouses it cert peen id C. Names of all my wife/husband's prior spouses Scotz Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? YES NO 15. If this petition is for a child is the child your adopted child? n/a If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. none OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF PETITIONER I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements are true and correct. Signature of petitioner t Nagenchan Thanfor Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 6th day of Feb 1979 P hila cp (SEAL) My commission expires (Signature AtillaEquirl of Officer Administering Oath) malance STELLA (Title) SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN PETITIONER Phila.
